name: TemplarSmash-DemoDayX
description:
*Improved(?) camera in latest version

**Melee basic attacks are actually in the works but won't make it this demo day

I've always enjoyed games in the vein of Jump ultimate superstars (GOAT), smash or the ds dragon ball fighting games, and thought it would be interesting if I could make my own take on the style while retaining what made those fun. Whether or not I'm on the right path is what I need you for!!!

Wasn't planning on releasing a demo so soon, as it is definitely not ready, but seeing all those games got me excited and I couldn't resist.

So, to sum it up: I think it has potential to be fun and different, and I would appreciate any kind of feedback in order to make a game people will enjoy playing.
